item.title: Obama calls NYC mayoral frontrunner Mamdani just days before crucial election
item.description: Former President Obama reached out to Democratic socialist Zohran Mamdani ahead of the NYC mayoral election against Andrew Cuomo and Curtis Sliwa.

item.title: Former Trump official warns Mamdani victory would mark ‘Marxist shift’ for New York City
